description: Defines a singly linked list data structure with methods to add, remove, get elements, and calculate size.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list implementation with basic operations such as add, remove, get, and size.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: A node in the linked list containing a data element and a reference to the next node.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Helper method to unlink a node from the list.
